Main Menu  |  By Contest  |  By Location  |  Voting In Arkansas  |  Candidate Info  |  Past Election Results

You can use this page to create custom reports of election returns across multiple contests, counties and polling locations. Choose the county and contest you want to view, any options you wish to set and click "Create Report", below.

1. Select Counties 2. Select Contests

Select All / None
Select All / None
3. Choose Report Options
Group by: Show votes as: Options:
Statewide (all counties) Vote counts Show Unopposed
by county Percentages download CSV/Excel
by polling location

 Include contest turnout
       (only CSV,Excel)
